net.rcode.nanomaps.tile
Class Tile

java.lang.Object
  net.rcode.nanomaps.tile.Tile
Direct Known Subclasses:
BitmapTile
public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for representing a Tile. Ultimately a tile should resolve to a Drawable, but this class supports tiles that have not yet loaded or that may load multiple times (ie. an initial preview followed by the full view).

Author:
stella

getState

public int getState()
  • STATE_NONE: No valid Drawable
  • STATE_PREVIEW: A valid Drawable is available but should be considered a preview
  • STATE_LOADED: A valid Drawable is available and should be considered final

Returns:
The current state

setStateChangedListener

public void setStateChangedListener(Tile.StateChangedListener stateChangedListener)
Set a listener to be notified of state/content changes

Parameters:
stateChangedListener -

destroy

public void destroy()
Called when the Tile is no longer needed. No further methods will be called on tile by the requestor after this call.

generatePreview

public void generatePreview(Rect displayRect,
                            TileSet previewMaterial)

generatePreview

protected static Drawable generatePreview(TileKey key,
                                          Rect displayRect,
                                          TileSet previewMaterial)
Attempt to assemble the tile from current material if possible. This may take current tiles and build a preview.

Parameters:
displayRect - the space that this tile occupies in the previewMaterial TileSet
previewMaterial - existing tiles
